addon_accessControl.name: Access Control Testing
addon_accessControl.description: Adds a set of tools for testing access control in web applications.
addon_accessControl.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_accessControl.changes:
Changed

  • Don't set the font color for inherited entries (Issue 6397).
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Maintenance changes (some changes impact the visibility of variables and add getters/setters, which may impact third party add-ons or scripts).
  • Change to no longer rely on core report classes, which are going to be deleted.

addon_alertFilters.name: Alert Filters
addon_alertFilters.description: Allows you to automate the changing of alert risk levels.
addon_alertFilters.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_alertFilters.changes:
Added

  • Stats for alerts changed

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

Fixed

  • Dialogs being shown under the owning dialog / frame.

addon_allinonenotes.name: All In One Notes
addon_allinonenotes.description: A simple extension to view all notes in one pane.
addon_allinonenotes.author: David Vassallo
addon_allinonenotes.changes:
Added

  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Update link to repository.
  • Maintenance changes.

addon_amf.name: AMF Support
addon_amf.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_amf.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

addon_ascanrules.name: Active scanner rules
addon_ascanrules.description: The release quality Active Scanner rules
addon_ascanrules.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_ascanrules.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.1.
  • The XSS scan rule will try several different payloads if the payload is being reflected outside of any HTML tags (for example in a JSON response body).

addon_ascanrulesAlpha.name: Active scanner rules (alpha)
addon_ascanrulesAlpha.description: The alpha quality Active Scanner rules
addon_ascanrulesAlpha.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_ascanrulesAlpha.changes:
Fixed

  • Log4Shell: Fixed the RMI Payloads (Issue 7002).
  • Log4Shell: Continue with further payloads if one payload throws an error

Changed

  • Log4Shell: Added detection for CVE-2021-45046

addon_ascanrulesBeta.name: Active scanner rules (beta)
addon_ascanrulesBeta.description: The beta quality Active Scanner rules
addon_ascanrulesBeta.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_attacksurfacedetector.name: Attack Surface Detector
addon_attacksurfacedetector.description: The Attack Surface Detector analyzes web application source code to generate endpoints that can be used for penetration testing.
addon_attacksurfacedetector.author: Secure Decisions (Matthew DeLetto)
addon_attacksurfacedetector.changes:
Various incremental changes (see https://github.com/secdec/attack-surface-detector-zap/releases)
Fix un-handled exception when target unavailable & address various "house keeping" tasks.

addon_authstats.name: Authentication Statistics
addon_authstats.description: Records logged in/out statistics for all contexts in scope.
addon_authstats.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_authstats.changes:
Added

  • Add repo URL.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Dynamically unload the add-on.
  • Change info URL to link to the site.

addon_automation.name: Automation Framework
addon_automation.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_automation.changes:
Fixed

  • Ensure system environment variables take precedence over configuration variables (Issue 7000).

addon_beanshell.name: BeanShell Console
addon_beanshell.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_beanshell.changes:
Added

  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Improve permissions and space handling when saving.

addon_browserView.name: Browser View
addon_browserView.description: Adds an option to render HTML responses like a browser
addon_browserView.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_browserView.changes: Allow to properly scroll the rendered page.

addon_bruteforce.name: Forced Browse
addon_bruteforce.description: Forced browsing of files and directories using code from the OWASP DirBuster tool
addon_bruteforce.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_bruteforce.changes:
Changed

  • Send HTTP messages with ZAP, making use of all its features (e.g. user authentication, custom user-agent, HTTP Sender scripts) (Issues 173 and 3060).
  • Now using 2.10 logging infrastructure (Log4j 2.x).
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

addon_bugtracker.name: Bug Tracker
addon_bugtracker.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_bugtracker.changes:
Added

  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Remove broken link from the user guide.

Fixed

  • Show correct help page for the options panel.
  • Remove the options panels when the add-on is uninstalled.

Removed

  • Remove unused resource message.

addon_callgraph.name: Call Graph
addon_callgraph.description: Allows the user to view a call graph of the selected resources
addon_callgraph.author: Colm O'Flaherty
addon_callgraph.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Maintenance changes.

addon_callhome.name: Call Home
addon_callhome.description: Handles all of the calls to ZAP services.
addon_callhome.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_codedx.name: Code Dx Extension
addon_codedx.description: Includes request and response data in XML reports and provides the ability to upload reports directly to a Code Dx server
addon_codedx.author: Code Dx, Inc.
addon_codedx.changes:
Added

  • Add repo URL.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Change info URL to link to the site.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Change to no longer rely on core report classes, which are going to be deleted.

addon_commonlib.name: Common Library
addon_commonlib.description: A common library, for use by other add-ons.
addon_commonlib.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_commonlib.changes:
Changed

  • Dependency updates.
  • Add OWASP WSTG v4.2 Alert Tags.

Fixed

  • Adjusted the tag of "OWASP_A10_LOGGING_FAIL" to match other alert tags for 2017/2021.

addon_communityScripts.name: Community Scripts
addon_communityScripts.description: Useful ZAP scripts written by the ZAP community.
addon_communityScripts.author: ZAP Community
addon_communityScripts.changes:
Added

  • variant/CompoundCookies.js - An input vector script that handles splitting of compound cookies (Issue 6582).
  • active/corsair.py > An active scan script to check for CORS related issues.)
  • payloadgenerator/securerandom.js > A fuzzer payload generator script that uses Java's SecureRandom as it's source (related to issue 6892).
  • active/bxss.py > an active scan script for inject blind xss payloads to the parameters

addon_coreLang.name: Core Language Files
addon_coreLang.description: Translations of the core language files
addon_coreLang.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_coreLang.changes:
Changed

  • Update the languages files from Crowdin.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Added more people to the credits.

addon_custompayloads.name: Custom Payloads
addon_custompayloads.description: Ability to add, edit or remove payloads that are used i.e. by active scanners
addon_custompayloads.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_diff.name: Diff
addon_diff.description: Displays a dialog showing the differences between 2 requests or responses. It uses diffutils and diff_match_patch
addon_diff.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_diff.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Updated menu items to use title caps (Issue 2000).

addon_directorylistv1.name: Directory List v1.0
addon_directorylistv1.description: List of directory names to be used with Forced Browse or Fuzzer add-on.
addon_directorylistv1.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_directorylistv2_3.description: Lists of directory names to be used with Forced Browse or Fuzzer add-on.

addon_directorylistv2_3_lc.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add repo URL.

Changed

  • Change info URL to link to the site.

addon_domxss.author: Aabha Biyani, ZAP Dev Team
addon_domxss.changes:
Changed

  • Dependency updates.

Added

  • Functionality for example alert handling in order to assist in documentation efforts.

addon_encoder.name: Encoder
addon_encoder.description: Adds encode/decode/hash dialog and support for scripted processors as well
addon_encoder.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_encoder.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

Removed

  • Groovy default template moved to Groovy add-on.

addon_evalvillain.name: Eval Villain
addon_evalvillain.description: Adds the Eval Villain extension to Firefox when launched from ZAP.
addon_evalvillain.author: Dennis Goodlett and the ZAP Dev Team

addon_fileupload.name: FileUpload
addon_fileupload.description: Detect File upload requests and scan them to find related vulnerabilities
addon_fileupload.author: KSASAN preetkaran20@gmail.com

addon_formhandler.name: Form Handler
addon_formhandler.description: This Form Handler Add-on allows a user to define field names and values to be used in a form's fields. Fields can be added, modified, enabled, and deleted for use in form fields.
addon_formhandler.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_fuzz.name: Fuzzer

addon_fuzzdboffensive.description: FuzzDB web backdoors and attack files which can be used with the ZAP fuzzer or for manual penetration testing
addon_fuzzdboffensive.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_gettingStarted.name: Getting Started with ZAP Guide
addon_gettingStarted.description: A short Getting Started with ZAP Guide
addon_gettingStarted.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_highlighter.name: Highlighter
addon_highlighter.description: Allows you to highlight strings in the request and response tabs.
addon_highlighter.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_highlighter.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

addon_hud.name: HUD - Heads Up Display
addon_hud.description: Display information from ZAP in browser.
addon_hud.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_hud.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Clarify resend tutorial instructions. #861
  • Update dependencies.

Fixed

  • Fix typo in tutorial.
  • Added initial accessibility fixes for modals and tabs

addon_imagelocationscanner.name: Image Location and Privacy Scanner
addon_imagelocationscanner.description: Image Location and Privacy Passive Scanner
addon_imagelocationscanner.author: Jay Ball (veggiespam) and the ZAP Dev Team
addon_imagelocationscanner.changes:
Added

  • OWASP Top Ten 2021/2017 mappings.
  • Example alert to support documentation efforts.

Changed

  • Update link to repository.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Maintenance changes.

addon_importLogFiles.name: Log File Importer
addon_importLogFiles.description: Allows you to import log files from ModSecurity and files previously exported from ZAP
addon_importLogFiles.author: Joseph Kirwin, ZAP Dev Team

addon_importurls.name: Import files containing URLs
addon_importurls.description: Adds an option to import a file of URLs. The file must be plain text with one URL per line.
addon_importurls.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_importurls.changes:
Retired

  • This add-on has been retired, and its functionality has been replaced by the Import/Export Add-on.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.1.

addon_invoke.name: Invoke Applications
addon_invoke.description: Invoke external applications passing context related information such as URLs and parameters
addon_invoke.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_jruby.name: Ruby Scripting
addon_jruby.description: Allows Ruby to be used for ZAP scripting - templates included
addon_jruby.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_jruby.changes:
Changed

  • Update links to zaproxy repo.
  • Rename reliability to confidence in active/passive templates.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

addon_jsonview.name: JSON View
addon_jsonview.description: Adds a view that shows JSON messages nicely formatted
addon_jsonview.author: Juha Kiveks
addon_jsonview.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add the main context menu to the JSON view.
  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Capitalize the view dropdown menu entry (related to Issue 2000).

addon_jwt.name: JWT Support
addon_jwt.description: Detect JWT requests and scan them to find related vulnerabilities
addon_jwt.author: KSASAN preetkaran20@gmail.com
addon_jwt.changes:
Added

  • Increased the number of requests for High threshold to 18 from 12.
  • Client side configuration alerts will not stop the scanner from scanning server side configurations.
  • Support for validating usage of publicly well known HMac secrets for signing JWT.

addon_jython.name: Python Scripting
addon_jython.description: Allows Python to be used for ZAP scripting - templates included
addon_jython.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_jython.changes:
Added

  • encode-decode default and rot13 templates.

Changed

  • Update links to zaproxy repo.
  • Rename reliability to confidence in active/passive templates.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

addon_kotlin.name: Kotlin Support
addon_kotlin.description: Allows Kotlin to be used for ZAP scripting
addon_kotlin.author: StackHawk Engineering
addon_kotlin.changes:
Changed

  • Use appropriate syntax style for highlighting of code.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

addon_neonmarker.name: Neonmarker
addon_neonmarker.description: Colors history table items based on tags
addon_neonmarker.author: Juha Kiveks, Kingthorin
addon_neonmarker.changes:
Changed

  • Add red/green icon to Enable/Disable toggle button.
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Now targeting ZAP 2.10.
  • Ensure added color mappings are unique (Issue 11). Only applies when mappings are added programmatically, a user can still define the same mapping multiple times via the GUI (hopefully they'll recognize the inefficiency of doing so).

addon_network.name: Network
addon_network.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_network.changes:
Added

  • API endpoints to generate, import (Issue 2280), and obtain the root CA certificate.
  • On weekly releases and versions after 2.11:
    • Server certificates management.
    • Handle command line arguments -certload, -certpubdump, and -certfulldump.
    • Options panel to manage the root CA certificate and issued certificates.
    • API endpoints to configure the validity of the root CA certificate and issued certificates (Issue 4673).

addon_oast.name: OAST Support
addon_oast.description: Allows you to exploit out-of-band vulnerabilities
addon_oast.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_oast.changes:
Changed

  • Set HttpSender's initiator to OAST_INITIATOR, value 16.

Fixed

  • Fixed Interactsh multi threading issue during register and deregister (Issue 6997)
  • Interactsh: server URL change in Options deregisters old server URL and registers new server URL
  • OAST Interactsh Options Dialog: If host or token config changed the 'New Payload' Button generates the Payload still with the old config. Button is disabled in that case.

addon_openapi.name: OpenAPI Support
addon_openapi.author: ZAP Dev Team plus Joanna Bona, Nathalie Bouchahine, Artur Grzesica, Mohammad Kamar, Markus Kiss, Michal Materniak, Marcin Spiewak, and SDA SE Open Industry Solutions
addon_openapi.changes:
Changed

  • Use examples defined in parameters (Issue #6870).
  • Tweak error message shown when content type is not supported.
  • Dependency updates.

Fixed

  • Fixed ClassCastException when using nested map properties with mixed definition styles.

addon_plugnhack.name: Plug-n-Hack Configuration
addon_plugnhack.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_plugnhack.changes:
Added

  • Add repo URL.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Issue 2000 - Updated strings shown in context menu with title caps.
  • Change info URL to link to the site.
  • Maintenance changes.

addon_portscan.name: Port Scanner
addon_portscan.description: Allows to port scan a target server
addon_portscan.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_portscan.changes:
Added

  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Update default values in the options to match the ones in the default configuration file.
  • Maintenance changes.

addon_pscanrules.name: Passive scanner rules
addon_pscanrules.description: The release quality Passive Scanner rules
addon_pscanrules.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_pscanrules.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.1.
  • Renamed 'X-Frame-Options Header Not Set' alert to 'Missing Anti-clickjacking Header', and associated scan rule 'X-Frame-Options Header' to 'Anti-clickjacking Header'. The rule already considered Content-Security-Policy 'frame-ancestors' which is a more modern solution to the same concern. Updated associated solution text. (Issue 6937)
  • Content Security Policy scan rule will no longer classify "require-trusted-types-for" or "trusted-types" directives as unknown (Issue 6602).

addon_pscanrulesAlpha.name: Passive scanner rules (alpha)
addon_pscanrulesAlpha.description: The alpha quality Passive Scanner rules
addon_pscanrulesAlpha.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_pscanrulesAlpha.changes:
Changed

  • Maintenance changes.

Added

  • OWASP Web Security Testing Guide v4.2 mappings where applicable.
  • Sub Resource Integrity Attribute Missing scan rule will now include the suggested integrity hash (Base64 encoded SHA384 hash) as part of the relevant Alert's Other Info details if the referenced script can be found in the Sites Tree (Issue 5894).

addon_pscanrulesBeta.name: Passive scanner rules (beta)
addon_pscanrulesBeta.description: The beta quality Passive Scanner rules
addon_pscanrulesBeta.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_pscanrulesBeta.changes:
Fixed

  • Fixed false positive in Reverse Tabnabbing scan rule.

Changed

  • Maintenance changes.

Added

  • OWASP Web Security Testing Guide v4.2 mappings where applicable.

addon_quickstart.name: Quick Start
addon_quickstart.description: Provides a tab which allows you to quickly test a target application
addon_quickstart.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_quickstart.changes:
Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.1.
  • Browser Launch/Manual Explore will now display a warning dialog if the selected browser executable cannot be found (Issue 6963).

  • Add info and repo URLs.

addon_replacer.changes:

  • Add button to automatically update content length (Issue 6254).

addon_saverawmessage.name: Save Raw Message
addon_saverawmessage.description: Allows to save content of HTTP messages as binary
addon_saverawmessage.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_saverawmessage.changes:
Retired

  • This add-on has been retired, and its functionality has been replaced by the Import/Export Add-on.

addon_savexmlmessage.name: Save XML Message
addon_savexmlmessage.description: Allows to save content of HTTP messages as XML
addon_savexmlmessage.author: thatsn0tmysite
addon_savexmlmessage.changes:
Retired

  • This add-on has been retired, and its functionality has been replaced by the Import/Export Add-on.

addon_scripts.name: Script Console
addon_scripts.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_scripts.changes:
Added

  • Allow to choose Kotlin for syntax highlighting.

Changed

  • Do not show Null script engine in Edit Script dialogue.
  • Now using 2.10 logging infrastructure (Log4j 2.x).
  • Update links to zaproxy and community-scripts repo.
  • Maintenance Changes.
  • 'Copy as curl command menu.js' is now preceded by a separator, and the Title Caps of the menu item were fixed (Issue 2000).
  • 'Copy as curl command menu.js' is now available in safe mode.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

addon_selenium.name: Selenium
addon_selenium.description: WebDriver provider and includes HtmlUnit browser
addon_selenium.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_sequence.name: Sequence
addon_sequence.description: Gives the possibility of defining a sequence of requests to be scanned.
addon_sequence.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_sequence.changes:
Added

  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Issue 2000 - Updated strings shown in active scan dialog with title caps.
  • Enable help button in Sequence tab of Active Scan dialog.
  • Maintenance changes.

addon_soap.name: SOAP Support
addon_soap.description: Imports and scans WSDL files containing SOAP endpoints.
addon_soap.author: Alberto (albertov91) + ZAP Dev Team
addon_soap.changes:
Changed

  • Maintenance changes.
  • WSDL File scan rule now includes identification of URLs in the form "example.com/service?wsdl", and specifically excludes 404s and 500s (including support for Custom Pages).
  • Import a WSDL file from a URL now logs a more specific message for some exception conditions, or when failing to convert the input 'URL' string into an actual URL to make the WSDL request.
  • The Import a WSDL file from a URL dialog now accepts pressing the enter key to activate the import process (instead of having to click the Import button), and the escape key to close/cancel the dialog.

addon_spiderAjax.name: Ajax Spider
addon_spiderAjax.description: Allows you to spider sites that make heavy use of JavaScript using Crawljax
addon_spiderAjax.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_sqliplugin.name: Advanced SQLInjection Scanner
addon_sqliplugin.description: An advanced active injection bundle for SQLi (derived by SQLMap)
addon_sqliplugin.author: Andrea Pompili (Yhawke)
addon_sqliplugin.changes:
Fixed

  • Re-ordered variable initialization to prevent an NPE.

addon_sse.name: Server-Sent Events
addon_sse.description: Allows you to view Server-Sent Events (SSE) communication.
addon_sse.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_sse.changes:
Added

  • Add info and repo URLs.

Fixed

  • Terminology

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Adjust log levels to be less verbose.
  • Maintenance changes.

addon_svndigger.name: SVN Digger Files
addon_svndigger.description: SVN Digger files which can be used with ZAP forced browsing
addon_svndigger.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_svndigger.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add repo URL.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Promote to release status.
  • Change info URL to link to the site.

addon_tokengen.name: Token Generation and Analysis
addon_tokengen.description: Allows you to generate and analyze pseudo random tokens, such as those used for session handling or CSRF protection
addon_tokengen.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_tokengen.changes:
Changed

  • Now using 2.10 logging infrastructure (Log4j 2.x).
  • Maintenance changes.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

addon_treetools.name: TreeTools
addon_treetools.description: Tools to add functionality to the tree view.
addon_treetools.author: Carl Sampson
addon_treetools.changes:
Added

  • Add help.
  • Add info and repo URLs.

Changed

  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.
  • Maintenance changes.

addon_wappalyzer.name: Wappalyzer - Technology Detection
addon_wappalyzer.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_wappalyzer.changes:
Changed

  • Updated with upstream Wappalyzer icon and pattern changes.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.1.

addon_webdriverlinux.name: Linux WebDrivers
addon_webdriverlinux.description: Linux WebDrivers for Firefox and Chrome.
addon_webdriverlinux.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_webdrivermacos.name: MacOS WebDrivers
addon_webdrivermacos.description: MacOS WebDrivers for Firefox and Chrome.
addon_webdrivermacos.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_webdriverwindows.name: Windows WebDrivers
addon_webdriverwindows.description: Windows WebDrivers for Firefox and Chrome.
addon_webdriverwindows.author: ZAP Dev Team

addon_websocket.name: WebSockets
addon_websocket.description: Allows you to inspect WebSocket communication.
addon_websocket.author: ZAP Dev Team
addon_websocket.changes:
Changed

  • Now using 2.10 logging infrastructure (Log4j 2.x).
  • Maintenance changes (some changes impact the visibility of variables and add getters/setters, which may impact third party add-ons or scripts).
  • Update links to repository.
  • Support passive scan alert examples so they can be added to the website
  • Missing default scripts will always be added and enabled on start up.
  • Update minimum ZAP version to 2.11.0.

addon_zest.name: Zest - Graphical Security Scripting Language
addon_zest.description: A graphical security scripting language, ZAPs macro language on steroids
addon_zest.author: ZAP Dev Team
